project.name: Clover for Eclipse Jar Upgrader
project.description:
Script upgrades the Clover for Eclipse with new versions of third party libraries: * ASM * KTreeMap
How to use it: ============== 1) When you extract the Clover-for-Eclipse update site you shall have a following directory layout /features /plugins /extlib upgrade.xml - this script site.xml 2) To update KTreeMap: - checkout source code from https://bitbucket.org/atlassian/ktreemap - modify KTreeMap source code as needed, bump version number in pom.xml, run 'mvn install' to create a JAR - update version number in ktreemap.ver property in this file 3) To update ASM: - update version number in asm5.ver 4) Put proper version number in clover.eclipse.release.num property 5) Run 'ant -f upgrade.xml' - script will download KTreeMap and ASM and repack Clover-for-Eclipse JAR
References: =========== If you want to upgrade third party libraries used by Clover Core (they are also used by Clover for Eclipse), please have a look at upgrade script in Clover-for-Ant and modify it to upgrade the following plugins: org.openclover.eclipse.ant_*.jar/clover-eclipse-ant.jar org.openclover.eclipse.core_*.jar org.openclover.eclipse.runtime_*.jar/clover-runtime.jar
